About us

At Hirekarma, we believe every  fresh graduate deserves a shot, regardless of their college background.  We've partnered with over 70 universities and 600+ companies to create a level playing field for talented graduates. Trusted by over 10,000 students, we help them launch successful careers and leave their mark on the industry.

Our services

For universities

Boost your graduate placement rate by partnering with Hirekarma.

For universities

Boost your graduate placement rate by partnering with Hirekarma. We connect your students with a vast network of reputable companies actively seeking entry level talent.

For universities

Boost your graduate placement rate by partnering with Hirekarma.

For employers

With us, Access a diverse pool of qualified fresh graduates, envision a future where hiring is effortless and efficient. Our end-to-end automated process is here to revolutionize your recruitment journey which will save you time and hassle!

For universities

Boost your graduate placement rate by partnering with Hirekarma.

For students

We partner with top companies seeking entry level talent that will help you kickstart as a fresher. We will be your guiding light in polishing your CVs and refining your LinkedIn profiles. From interview prep to landing your dream job, we're with you every step of the way.
